title: HR Management Practice Competency Enhancement: Online Message Design Practice Using Mobile Microblogging

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can collect and analyze design cases at least three times per week using mobile microblogging tools
Learners can provide specific feedback based on design principles at least twice weekly on peers' posts
Learners can synthesize ten or more collected cases and submit reports on design principle applications and improvement plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
